Title: Unauthorized Cinnamon
Plot: Bullock's proposal carries the day during a meeting held at the Gem to discuss the Hearst conundrum; Aunt Lou fears for Odell's well-being after his latest gambit; Fields is skeptical of Steve's offer to remain in camp; Cochran finds other uses for a tailor's swatches; Chesterton's illness postpones Langrishe's theater plans.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Jennifer Lutheran (Jen),   Ashleigh Kizer (Dolly),   Gordon Clapp (Tailor),   Gail Flatt,   Bud Clark,   Ralph Richeson (Richardson),   Aubrey Morris (Chesterton),   Brent Sexton (Harry Young),   Pavel Lychn
